resources.string: Welcome to cowost, the co-working space system, this app allow your to communicate to your favourite co-working spaces, also if you are a co-working space owner you can create your profile and add posts to communicate with your visitors, a lot of features will added soon!,relax.
Create Profile - Add Post - Display All Users - Create Your Fav. Users - Adjust Your Personal Settings - Display App Info. - Help Form Developer - Delete Account - Logout
Tawfik Yasser Tawfik - Junior Android Developer - 20 Years - Student at Faculty of Computers and Artificial Intelligence - From Cairo - Email: tawfekyassertawfek@gmail.com - Tel.:01129348206
